name: Hearts and Spades
description: Hearts and Spades was developed over two days by Max Hammerlund, Meghan Jonas, and Liam Koehler during the Global Game Jam 2016. You set up the pieces on the board, then they move themselves. Use WASD to select from four different types of units, each with their own advantages and disadvantages. When you've set it up, press enter to see your units fight for you.
